website_summaries.verdict: This is a very informative and thorough guide that is easy to understand and use.
pros: Covers hundreds of species of wildflowers
Quickly becomes an easy "go to" book
Includes range maps and common names
Includes habitat, size of flowers, and what to look for when spotting
Also identified by when the flower is in bloom
cons: The paperback on this field guide is not reinforced with any kind of waterproof or trail-friendly material

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE: Title and Cover Don't Match
customer_reviews.text: As of 12/25/2018 the title of the book and the cover don't match. I thought I was ordering the Reader's Digest North American Wildlife PLANTS & ANIMALS book, but instead I received the Reader's Digest North American Wildlife WILDFLOWERS book. It's still a great book. Got it used for $3.00 + shipping so I kept it, but still had to order the other book. Just be aware that if you order this book and are expecting to receive the Plants & Animals book, you're going to receive the Wildflower book.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyPTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shipping, Great Book!
customer_reviews.text: My sister has had this book for years & I always liked it. We live on the lake & I had never seen a bird that has been hanging out around the marsh so I decided to look this book up & order it. So glad I have it very resourceful, oh yea & the bird was the "American Coot." Ordered through Amazon from a local bookstore called Red Robin Books & received it within a day! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Willowu517

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This book is awesome! So easy to use. I was able to identify about 20 species of plants,insects and birds that I had photographed over the summer in a matter of minutes. So nice to be able to put a name to a photo. This book is a great key to exploring the north American outdoors. I'm sure I will get a ton of use out of it. The illustrations are beautiful and accurate and the book came in excellent condition. I can't believe the amazing price I got for it too. This will be well loved for sure!
customer_reviews.author: loveAD12

customer_reviews.title: Invaluable, Priceless book!
customer_reviews.text: Great educational book to learn about trees, bugs, animals, etc. I used this book when I was in school. I enjoyed it so much that 20 years later I purchased another copy to have. The copy I grew up with ended up pretty worn out and eventually was lost. The part I like the most is that for each tree, bug, animal, etc, it shows a map with a shaded area of where it can be found in North America. I consider it an invaluable and priceless book. Many thanks to all the people who worked on it!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: and was so happy to find it here on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I actually earned this book selling cookies in Girl Scouts over 30 years ago. I used the book for 15 years, any animal, plant, fish, bug, anything in wild life I ever needed to identify this was the go to book, it ALWAYS had the answers. And lost the book when I grew up and married. I have looked and looked, and was so happy to find it here on Amazon. I highly recommend this book. I plan on using it to help my children with wild life studies as we homeschool.
customer_reviews.author: PrairieGirl

customer_reviews.title: a fabulous resource book
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to resource for identifying any and every creature i encounter. Bugs in the garden, wildlife the cats bring in, birds showing up in my yard. I have kept my original copy of this book for over 30 years, since my kids were little, and just recently bought a copy for a friends 8 yr old son. He loves it, took it to school for show and tell. And shared it with his neighborhood friends. If i could only keep onece book. This would be the one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great colored photos!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a family member as I have my own. This book is great for finding plants or animals in North America. the descriptions and added information is really great.
customer_reviews.author: Marge V.

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as the more modern additions
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased several of the newer versions as Christmas presents for the hunters in our family, but this older version is what my Grandmother used and she was the one who introduced me to this book. My mother now has that well worn copy and recently her granddaughter wanted one like it to use with her own son. I found a used copy in good condition and purchased it for her. The copy was well taken care of as describe in very good condition and the grand daughter is now using that with her own son.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very informative.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this book. We had an old one that fell apart. So I ordered a new one. Was able to fix the first one so we gave it to her. You can find out so much with this book.
customer_reviews.author: MLC

customer_reviews.title: Nice Book But Not Very Helpful
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice book of wildflowers. It contains only drawings, no photos, but, at least, they are all in color. The drawings won't help much in identifying flowers unless you happen to be standing right beside it and even then the vast majority of the pictures aren't detailed enough to be really sure about anything. The information on range of the different flowers isn't usually very specific. However, there is a nice touch of general information or lore about many of the plants. I got my copy used and cheap so it's OK - I wouldn't have been too happy about paying full price for it, though.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Dutton

customer_reviews.title: Great book
customer_reviews.text: Very informative book. A lot of good information and detailed drawings.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Smelled like old cigarette smoke!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Book was in great condition, no marks or folded or missing pages however it smells like old cigarette smoke. I got it to use the images in an art journal and my work smelled like smoke so bad, I had to get rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: great source
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these: 1 for car, 1 at work, and 1 in the house. I bought this for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great resource for identifying the wildlife in your own back yard!
customer_reviews.text: Growing up my parents had this book and as a family we used it quite often to help us identify a bug, snake, flower or bird. I've wanted a copy for some time to share with my own children, since my mom still uses hers so frequently, she didn't want to part with hers. There are probably more detailed resources out there but for the variety of species offered in this book, it is hard to pass up owning one of your own.
customer_reviews.author: msag78

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Very informative book with great illustrations. I really like how it tells you where you can find everything, and about what time of year to start looking for it.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Great resource for nature lovers!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a used version, but we absolutely love this book. Use it all the time when we go on hikes.
customer_reviews.author: Love Nature

customer_reviews.title: Love this book!
customer_reviews.text: I live in the country and use this book to identify insects, etc.
customer_reviews.author: 20 year educator

customer_reviews.title: Readers Digest guide to North American Wildlife
customer_reviews.text: If you can get a hold on one of these old copies of this book your child can have fun all summer long looking for nature items. This book is printed so beautifully with illustrations that capture the imagination. I had this book for my children and now I bought one used for each grandchild family. It is great for school work and any kind of artist who needs an accurate look at an animal or bug. So this book is a rounding yes!! to own.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: great layout for me
customer_reviews.text: exactly what i remember,great layout for me,arrived quickly,perfect price and shipping,been looking for this older edition for a while!So glad i found it!
customer_reviews.author: knotty pine

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome book. I bought it for a school project ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome book. I bought it for a school project and was going to cut out animal pictures. But, when I got it my kids loved it so much we decided not to cut it up. They read it and look at the animals all the time.
customer_reviews.author: J.D.Allen

customer_reviews.title: Very good book..
customer_reviews.text: I love this book..I can look things up and see what type of animal, plant , insect or mammal if you want to know what type it is..
customer_reviews.author: Denise M

customer_reviews.title: Great reference book.
customer_reviews.text: This book is great for using for a reference for kids in school. My grandchildren are loving the bird session as they come to my house and watch the birds at the feeder, they look them up identify them, and for their school reports they even have their technical names. We will be using this book a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Sayers

customer_reviews.title: Great Resource for identifying native plants & animals
customer_reviews.text: Great Resource for identifying native plants & animals! Was given one many years ago and have recommended to many family members and friends. This was ordered as a gift for a nature enthusiast and was appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love, love, love this book!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this book about thirty years ago and it is the most used book I have owned! It is falling apart where whole chapters are falling out. I was so happy to see this book offered, so I ordered it to give to my son and his children. I know they will get as much use out of it as I have. We have always loved birds and animals and nature. It is by far the best and most informative about birds, animals, plants, and many other things! Thank you Reader's Digest for putting such an incredible book out there for all to read and learn from.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Cote

customer_reviews.title: What's old is new again
customer_reviews.text: I has this book growing up and literally read it cover to cover. Condition of the book was nice and has a bonus note from the previous owners grandparents adding to the charm. So glad to have this back in my book collection.
customer_reviews.author: ToriLBC

customer_reviews.title: We have had the book for several decades
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased new copies of it for my children to be able to share the info with my grandchildren. After owning the original for several decades we still use the book often to find plants or animals that we see in our travels. The book continues to exceed my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: MD New York

customer_reviews.title: While this wildlife book was published nearly 35 years ago ...
customer_reviews.text: While this wildlife book was published nearly 35 years ago, it is still the de facto standard by which all other wildlife books are, and will be, judged.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Loughrey

customer_reviews.title: An Oldie But A Goodie
customer_reviews.text: This is an old book, but it still has relevant information. It has animals and insects in a good enough variety that it out shines other, newer books.
customer_reviews.author: MuddyDuck

customer_reviews.title: I think it is much better than the newer ones
customer_reviews.text: Was very to find this edition. I think it is much better than the newer ones. I don't know how people feel about Reader's Digest books but I think they would be surprised to find his informative and thorough this book is. I've owned my copy for 30 years and still use it. I would definitely recommend this book.
customer_reviews.author: Robespierre

customer_reviews.title: Excellent resource
customer_reviews.text: No home should be without this book. Very well illustrated. Our kids spend hours with it.
customer_reviews.author: dboyt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great book keep learning something new ive had 75 species ive identified at home and still helps
customer_reviews.author: Edward R. Ashby

customer_reviews.title: Lots of different animals and plants identified with nice descriptions.
customer_reviews.text: My parents had this book when I was a kid, so I had to get it now I'm "grown up". Lots of different animals and plants identified with nice descriptions.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: A great book to have
customer_reviews.text: A great book to have. I take it with me when Im walking in the woods so I can identify the flowers I come across.
customer_reviews.author: J. S.

customer_reviews.title: I love this book I used it all the time......
customer_reviews.text: I love this book I used it all the time as a little girl growing up. I loved animals and wanted to know what everything was. when my mom lost the old book I knew I had to order her a new one and I grabbed one for my self too.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella F.

customer_reviews.title: North American Wildlife
customer_reviews.text: A great book for identification of plants, trees, animals, etc. I had one that I lent to family and decided to get another so that they can keep their own copy. Living in a wooded area, they are always using it to identify plants, birds, salamanders, or other wildlife.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Brown

customer_reviews.title: Why I bought this book
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these books for many years, recently a young man was visiting and sav the book, picked it up and started reading. He was so interested it he ended up taking it home with him. I felt there were so many, many other things he could be interested in rather than this book, he took it home with him. Was so glad to find this so how we both have one!!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy G. Jones

customer_reviews.title: I love this book.
customer_reviews.text: I love this book. It is great for any nature lover. I look at it all the time. I have my mom's book, believe it or not from 1982. I have bought this book for at least 5 other people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Readers Digest North American Wildlife Book
customer_reviews.text: I had a copy of this book & so does my sister and her youngest grandson kept asking her who bought it for him so I found this one on you site, and he now has a copy and loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: ruth santamore

customer_reviews.title: It is a Wonderful book, super for quick reference
customer_reviews.text: I had to get this book after using my girlfriend shared hers with me. It is a Wonderful book, super for quick reference.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Abigail

customer_reviews.title: great book for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Just like we had when my son was little. Great gift for grandchildren.

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed not nearly as nice as the readers digest bird book. It was out standing not as good as old bird book

customer_reviews.title: BEST BOOK EVER
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE ONE COPY OF THIS FROM YEARS AGO, AND I LOVE IT. I HAVE BORROWED IT OUT SEVERAL TIMES TO SCHOOL AGE KIDS FOR IDENTIFICATION OF PLANTS ETC. HAD A CHANCE TO BUY MORE COPIES FOR FRIENDS SO I DIDN'T HESITATE.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what they showed
customer_reviews.text: The addition is very old from 1998. The book I have used before has different content. So, this wasn't the book I really wanted. The book was in the condition stated and was sent quickly. I can still use this book, but I'm not overjoyed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Sleight

customer_reviews.title: This is like reuniting with an old friend.
customer_reviews.text: Saw a copy of this book back in the 80's and loved it. Very informative and I love the illustrations which are drawings and not photographs. This book has helped me identify many birds, and flowers that grow in my area. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: How do they pack so much into one book????? I use it as learning tool with kids. Love this!

customer_reviews.title: The best book on North American wildlife!
customer_reviews.text: This my fifth copy of this great book on North American wildlife. They seem to keep disappearing from my library, when grandchildren visit!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's an excellent resource book with lots of photos and information. A must have for wildlife study.

customer_reviews.title: Great book

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased with my order
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with my order. I wanted to give it as a gift and was worried about the condition but it was in great condition and I had no problem giving it away. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Reader's Digest Wildflower Guide
customer_reviews.text: Great reference book. Vendor shipped promptly but incorrectly described the book as hardcover. I was disappointed to find it is really a paperback, albeit with a glossy cover. Probably easier to take on field trips, but I just wish I knew what I was buying.

customer_reviews.text: How did I like it, I purchased 3 copies for family and Friends. Nuf said. Tom

customer_reviews.text: My first copy of this book was destroyed and I have looked for it for about 3 years. So glad to find it again. One of my favorites.

customer_reviews.title: Love this Book
customer_reviews.text: A book I have multiply copies of because I use it to identify plants and animals myself as I hike. I also use it in my teaching and students just love this book. Should be put back into print.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful book! My daughter would borrow this book from the school library. She learned things that I'd never even heard about. Great educational tool.

customer_reviews.title: Reader's Digest North American Wildlife
customer_reviews.text: The book was delivered without the paper cover. The front and back hard covers were slightly bowed, and the book had a slight musty smell.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
